AD_FriendsSummoned.synopsis: Spoken by Oliver as he summons more creatures to his defence while the player tries to seize him.

AD_Dome75PercentHP.synopsis: This AD happens when you damage nightdome and bring it below 75%.
AD_Dome75PercentHP.how_to_trigger: 1. Use Debug Book - Set Quest Flags - Act 2 - GLO - Lifting the curse - Quest States  - Halsin at camp with Spirit2. Use Debug Book - Set Quest Flags - Act 2 - GLO - Lifting the curse - Quest States - Oliver Fled to Town - teleports Oliver to the plaza in the Town and readies him for a fight. Also teleports you to the plaza as well, you'll only need to approach Oliver to start combat.3. Attack the Nightdome and reduce its HP to less than 75%.

AD_Dome50PercentHP.synopsis: This AD happens when you damage nightdome and bring it below 50%.
AD_Dome50PercentHP.how_to_trigger: 1. Use Debug Book - Set Quest Flags - Act 2 - GLO - Lifting the curse - Quest States  - Halsin at camp with Spirit2. Use Debug Book - Set Quest Flags - Act 2 - GLO - Lifting the curse - Quest States - Oliver Fled to Town - teleports Oliver to the plaza in the Town and readies him for a fight. Also teleports you to the plaza as well, you'll only need to approach Oliver to start combat.3. Attack the Nightdome and reduce its HP to less than 50%.

AD_Hiding.synopsis: The first time Oliver hides he'll turn invisible and run away. As long as players are nearby the closest one will hear his voice inside his head (like how the emperor does) laughing at them for not being able to find him.

AD_Dome25PercentHP.synopsis: This AD happens when you damage nightdome and bring it below 25%.
AD_Dome25PercentHP.how_to_trigger: 1. Use Debug Book - Set Quest Flags - Act 2 - GLO - Lifting the curse - Quest States  - Halsin at camp with Spirit2. Use Debug Book - Set Quest Flags - Act 2 - GLO - Lifting the curse - Quest States - Oliver Fled to Town - teleports Oliver to the plaza in the Town and readies him for a fight. Also teleports you to the plaza as well, you'll only need to approach Oliver to start combat.3. Attack the Nightdome and reduce its HP to less than 25%.

AD_PlushDied.synopsis: AD that Oliver plays when his Plush is killed by the player during the fight at the plaza in Shadow Cursed Town
AD_PlushDied.how_to_trigger: 1. Use Debug Book - Set Quest Flags - Act 2 - GLO - Lifting the curse - Quest States  - Halsin at camp with Spirit2. Use Debug Book - Set Quest Flags - Act 2 - GLO - Lifting the curse - Quest States - Oliver Fled to Town - teleports Oliver to the plaza in the Town and readies him for a fight. Also teleports you to the plaza as well, you'll only need to approach Oliver to start combat.3. Kill Plush.

PAD_FlowersAtHouse.synopsis: PAD commenting on the unusual fact that flowers are growing around Olver's House despite it being in the Shadowcurse.
PAD_FlowersAtHouse.how_to_trigger: Goto 65, 40, 20 in SCL_Main_A and walk towards Olivers House.

Acceptance.synopsis: Dialog with Oliver, in which the player confronts him and convinces him to rejoin Thaniel, his other half. so that the shadow curse can be lifted. Oliver will always return to Thaniel after this dialogue, but the player can be harsh or gentle in how they do so.
Acceptance.how_to_trigger: 1. Debug Book - Set Quest Flags - Act 2 - GLO Lifting the Curse - Halsin at camp with Spirit2. Debug Book - Set Quest Flags - Act 2 - GLO Lifting the Curse - Oliver fled to Town - this will teleport you to the plaze in the Town3. Approach Oliver, he will start a fight and summon some creatures.4. Teleport closer to him - he'll unsummon the creatures and start this dialog with you.

AD_StartOfFight.synopsis: AD from Oliver if players chase him to the TWN Center for the climax of Lifting the Curse
AD_StartOfFight.how_to_trigger: Debug Book > quest flags and options > Act 2 > GLO - Lifting the Curse > Halsin and Spirit at Camp.Then teleport to Olivers House, spam 1 til he runs away. Click the portal to follow him. When you arrive at the other end of the teleporter, he should play the AD.

AD_SummoningPlush.synopsis: AD that Oliver plays when he summons his Plush during the fight at the plaza in Shadow Cursed Town

AD_AfterHideAndSeek.synopsis: After playing with Oliver hide and seek for two times he will stay at his house. Depending on how the player did, he'll be left thinking about new ideas on how to improve his hide and seek abilities or happy because they didn't find him without alerting/killing the shadows.

AD_FriendsSummoned_0.speaker: Oliver
AD_FriendsSummoned_0.text: I'll make my own fun if I have to - and my own friends.

AD_Dome75PercentHP_0.speaker: Oliver
AD_Dome75PercentHP_0.text: Stop that! You're supposed to be playing, not breaking things!
AD_Dome75PercentHP_0.context: NodeContext: Angry (player is trying to break through a protective magic dome guarding Oliver)

AD_Dome50PercentHP_0.speaker: Oliver
AD_Dome50PercentHP_0.text: You're spoiling my fun! Stop it right now, or you'll be sorry!
AD_Dome50PercentHP_0.context: NodeContext: Angry (player is attacking a magic dome shielding Oliver, reducing its integrity by 50%)

AD_Hiding_0.speaker: Oliver
AD_Hiding_0.text: Come on, are you even looking?
AD_Hiding_0.context: NodeContext: teasing, giggly whispers during a game of hide and seek.

AD_Hiding_1.speaker: Oliver
AD_Hiding_1.text: So close. But I'm still winning.
AD_Hiding_1.context: NodeContext: teasing, giggly whispers during a game of hide and seek.

AD_Hiding_2.speaker: Oliver
AD_Hiding_2.text: Hehe. Think you can find me...?
AD_Hiding_2.context: NodeContext: teasing, giggly whispers during a game of hide and seek.

AD_Hiding_3.speaker: Oliver
AD_Hiding_3.text: Come on, are your eyes even open?
AD_Hiding_3.context: NodeContext: teasing, giggly whispers during a game of hide and seek.

AD_Dome25PercentHP_0.speaker: Oliver
AD_Dome25PercentHP_0.text: Why are you doing this? All I wanted to do was play!
AD_Dome25PercentHP_0.context: NodeContext: Angry (player has reduced a magic dome shielding Oliver to 25% integrity)

AD_PlushDied_0.speaker: Oliver
AD_PlushDied_0.text: Why can't you just play nice?
AD_PlushDied_0.context: NodeContext: mid-combat, annoyed and upset that players are breaking his minions (toys that he summons)

AD_PlushDied_1.speaker: Oliver
AD_PlushDied_1.context: NodeContext: mid-combat, shouting at players who just broke one of his summons (a giant toy)

AD_PlushDied_2.speaker: Oliver
AD_PlushDied_2.text: You don't deserve nice things. Maybe you'll get some not-so-nice things.
AD_PlushDied_2.context: NodeContext: mid-combat, annoyed and upset that players are breaking his minions (toys that he summons)

AD_PlushDied_3.speaker: Oliver
AD_PlushDied_3.context: NodeContext: mid-combat, shouting at players who just broke one of his summons (a giant toy)

PAD_FlowersAtHouse_0.speaker: Player
PAD_FlowersAtHouse_0.text: Flowers blooming in shadow. This is the sign Halsin mentioned.

PAD_FlowersAtHouse_1.speaker: Player
PAD_FlowersAtHouse_1.text: Wildflowers growing amidst the darkness. Thaniel's missing half must be near.

PAD_FlowersAtHouse_2.speaker: Player
PAD_FlowersAtHouse_2.text: Flowers? How are they growing here, of all places?

Acceptance_33.speaker: Oliver
Acceptance_33.text: I'm not leaving - you can't make me!

Acceptance_58.speaker: Halsin
Acceptance_58.text: Be gentle. He's much more than a child, but he doesn't truly know that.
Acceptance_58.context: NodeContext: Discreet, advisory. Doesn't want to upset Oliver any more than he already is.

Acceptance_41.speaker: Player
Acceptance_41.text: You don't have to leave. All you have to do is lend Thaniel your strength.

Acceptance_9.speaker: Player
Acceptance_9.text: You're just a thieving shadow that thinks it's a child. Playtime's over - Thaniel's waiting.

Acceptance_43.speaker: Oliver
Acceptance_43.text: You're a bad winner, but you're still a winner. I'll go - you've taken everything that I cared about.

Acceptance_56.speaker: Halsin
Acceptance_56.text: You didn't need to be so hard on him.
Acceptance_56.context: NodeContext: Disapproving. We said something unnecessarily harsh to Oliver

Acceptance_39.speaker: Oliver
Acceptance_39.text: I hope you're nicer to Thaniel than you are to me.

Acceptance_52.speaker: Halsin
Acceptance_52.text: It's done. More cruelly than it needed to be, but done all the same. We should return to Thaniel when we can.
Acceptance_52.context: NodeContext: Satisfied - but with a tinge of criticism towards the player

Acceptance_18.speaker: Player
Acceptance_18.text: You have what you want, but not what you need: Thaniel. He's your friend, your kin - he's you.

Acceptance_54.speaker: Oliver
Acceptance_54.text: He's nothing to me. He left me here, all this time. I had to do everything for myself!

Acceptance_4.speaker: Oliver
Acceptance_4.text: Even when it was scary. Even when I was alone. I didn't give up.

Acceptance_42.speaker: Player
Acceptance_42.text: Nobody's to blame here. The curse tore you two apart - now you can be reunited.

Acceptance_25.speaker: Oliver
Acceptance_25.text: But would he even want me back...? I've changed. A lot.

Acceptance_37.speaker: Player
Acceptance_37.text: Of course he will. You're bound to each other - always.

Acceptance_2.speaker: Oliver
Acceptance_2.text: So I wouldn't have to be alone anymore? He'd stay with me? Play with me?

Acceptance_14.speaker: Oliver
Acceptance_14.text: I'd like that. And he would too, I think. All right, I'll do it. I want to do it.

Acceptance_53.speaker: Halsin
Acceptance_53.context: NodeContext: Proud, choking up a little.

Acceptance_21.speaker: Oliver
Acceptance_21.text: Are you crying? You're a bit big to be crying... but I suppose that's okay.

Acceptance_62.speaker: Oliver
Acceptance_62.text: Bye. And thank you for playing with me.

Acceptance_5.speaker: Halsin
Acceptance_5.text: It's done, at last. Soon the land will be unshrouded. We should return to Thaniel when we can.

Acceptance_15.speaker: Player
Acceptance_15.text: Change is good. That's what growing up is all about. Together, you two will become more than you were before.

Acceptance_51.speaker: Oliver
Acceptance_51.text: So I wouldn't have to make up friends to play with anymore? I'd have someone real?

Acceptance_0.speaker: Player
Acceptance_0.text: Of course he'll want you back - it's nature's will. You're meant to be together.

Acceptance_55.speaker: Player
Acceptance_55.text: You were very brave and resourceful. Think of how much you'll be able to help Thaniel.

Acceptance_7.speaker: Player
Acceptance_7.text: Enough coddling. You're going back to Thaniel - now.

Acceptance_1.speaker: Player
Acceptance_1.text: People are dying for the sake of your fun, kid.

Acceptance_19.speaker: Halsin
Acceptance_19.context: NodeContext: Disapproving. We said something unnecessarily harsh to Oliver

Acceptance_26.speaker: Oliver
Acceptance_26.text: I told you already - nobody dies here. They come back, over and over, a little different every time.

Acceptance_45.speaker: Oliver
Acceptance_45.text: But I don't change, not really. So maybe I won't come back. Maybe the game will end with me.

Acceptance_6.speaker: Oliver
Acceptance_6.text: Maybe that's for the best. I'm tired. Nobody real wants to play me - they only want Thaniel. They can have him.

Acceptance_57.speaker: Oliver
Acceptance_57.text: Nobody dies here. They always come back to play with me, just a little different each time.

Acceptance_31.speaker: Player
Acceptance_31.text: Talk to him, Halsin. You know what needs to be said better than anyone.

Acceptance_46.speaker: Halsin
Acceptance_46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Halsin is addressing the playerNodeContext: Determined/stepping up to the plate (figuratively)

Acceptance_50.speaker: Halsin
Acceptance_50.text: Oliver. Nobody is making you leave - this is your home. But it is dark, empty... lonely. I don't want you to be alone. I want you to be with Thaniel.
Acceptance_50.context: CinematicNodeContext: Halsin is addressing OliverNodeContext: Gentle, empathetic. Like talking to a young, but smart, child (it's really an ageless spirit, but presents as a child)

Acceptance_38.speaker: Oliver
Acceptance_38.text: Why should I go back to him? He abandoned me!
Acceptance_38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Oliver is addressing HalsinNodeContext: Angry

Acceptance_61.speaker: Halsin
Acceptance_61.text: No - you were stolen from each other. Neither of you are to blame. And I know your pain. I truly do.
Acceptance_61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Halsin is addressing OliverNodeContext: Gentle, empathetic. Like talking to a young, but smart, child (it's really an ageless spirit, but presents as a child)

Acceptance_48.speaker: Halsin
Acceptance_48.text: Thaniel was my friend also. I played with him, grew up while he stayed the same. He made me who I am today, and then he was ripped away from me, same as for you.
Acceptance_48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Halsin is addressing OliverNodeContext: Gentle, empathetic. Like talking to a young, but smart, child (it's really an ageless spirit, but presents as a child)

Acceptance_16.speaker: Halsin
Acceptance_16.text: But you need not be alone any longer. You need not invent friends. Thaniel is back. He is waiting for you.
Acceptance_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Halsin is addressing OliverNodeContext: Gentle, empathetic. Like talking to a young, but smart, child (it's really an ageless spirit, but presents as a child)

Acceptance_36.speaker: Oliver
Acceptance_36.text: ...Fine. I'll do it. It might be nice to be with him again.
Acceptance_36.context: CinematicNodeContext: Oliver is addressing HalsinNodeContext: Conceding

Acceptance_60.speaker: Oliver
Acceptance_60.text: Why couldn't you just leave me alone? Why can't I just stay here, playing? I had everything I've ever wanted, right here, and you've ruined it!

AD_StartOfFight_1.speaker: Oliver
AD_StartOfFight_1.text: You should have just left me alone!

AD_StartOfFight_0.speaker: Oliver
AD_StartOfFight_0.text: Spoil my fun? I'll teach you a lesson - just you watch.

AD_SummoningPlush_0.speaker: Oliver
AD_SummoningPlush_0.context: NodeContext: he's summoning toys to fight the players - malicious, but playful

AD_SummoningPlush_1.speaker: Oliver
AD_SummoningPlush_1.text: Don't you like my toys? Give them another try.
AD_SummoningPlush_1.context: NodeContext: he's summoning toys to fight the players - malicious, but playful

AD_SummoningPlush_2.speaker: Oliver
AD_SummoningPlush_2.text: You want to play? Let me show you my favourite toy.
AD_SummoningPlush_2.context: NodeContext: he's summoning toys to fight the players - malicious, but playful

AD_SummoningPlush_3.speaker: Oliver
AD_SummoningPlush_3.text: I can do this forever and ever. Just you see.
AD_SummoningPlush_3.context: NodeContext: he's summoning toys to fight the players - malicious, but playful

AD_AfterHideAndSeek_0.speaker: Oliver
AD_AfterHideAndSeek_0.text: You were good. But just you wait - I'll get better.
AD_AfterHideAndSeek_0.context: NodeContext: A little miffed at losing/considering ways to improve his hide & seek game

AD_AfterHideAndSeek_1.speaker: Oliver
AD_AfterHideAndSeek_1.text: I didn't think anyone would ever actually find me...
AD_AfterHideAndSeek_1.context: NodeContext: A little miffed at losing/considering ways to improve his hide & seek game

AD_AfterHideAndSeek_2.speaker: Oliver
AD_AfterHideAndSeek_2.text: You need a lot more practice before you can beat me.

AD_AfterHideAndSeek_3.speaker: Oliver
AD_AfterHideAndSeek_3.text: I win, again. I always win.

AD_AfterHideAndSeek_5.speaker: Oliver
AD_AfterHideAndSeek_5.text: I need to find new hiding spots.
AD_AfterHideAndSeek_5.context: NodeContext: A little miffed at losing/considering ways to improve his hide & seek game

AD_AfterHideAndSeek_6.speaker: Oliver
AD_AfterHideAndSeek_6.text: Maybe I should be quieter when I'm hiding...
AD_AfterHideAndSeek_6.context: NodeContext: A little miffed at losing/considering ways to improve his hide & seek game
